ymax <- max(y0,y1,y2)
ymin <- min(y0,y1,y2)
yquart <- (ymax-ymin)/4
plot(x,y0,type="l",col=rainbow(3)[1],main="Average Phastcons around the Center of Sites",xlab="Distance from the Center (bp)",ylab="Average Phastcons",ylim=c(ymin-yquart,ymax+yquart))
lines(x,y1,col=rainbow(3)[2])
lines(x,y2,col=rainbow(3)[3])
abline(v=0)
legend("topright",c('FB1','FB2','FB3'),col=rainbow(3),lty=c(1,1,1))
dev.off()
